A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought it was fantastic\, something deep and different from all the past movies.  sort of like the later versions of star wars the clone wars.  if the director wanted Luke to die in the end and Disney approved it\, then fine by me.  Only thing they could have cut out was Leia in space\, no other jedi has done that\, so we didn't need her to do it..
